text: Eddystone is a borough in Delaware County, Pennsylvania, United States. The population was 2,459 at the 2020 census. ==Demographics== ==Notable residents== * Margaret Matson, local landowner known as the Witch of Ridley Creek * Jennifer Aniston, the actress lived in the borough for a time with her father, John Aniston, her mother, and grandmother. She attended Eddystone Elementary. == References == == Other websites == * Borough of Eddystone official website Category:1888 establishments in the United States Category:Boroughs in Pennsylvania
title: Eddystone, Pennsylvania
